languages.text:
{n}Ульфар покровительственно смотрит на Хальбрандта.{/n}
"Пиршество битвы с тобой, юный брат, разделю,
Чтобы сполна ты отведал моей ратной доблести мьода!
Вкус сей запомни, в нем сладость победы и горечь утрат!"

{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ульфар покровительственно смотрит на Хальбрандта.{/n}
"Пиршество битвы с тобой, юный брат, разделю,

Вкус сей запомни, в нем сладость победы и горечь утрат!"

languages.text:
{n}乌尔法以高人一等的眼神看着哈尔布兰特。{/n}
“年轻的兄弟，
我将与你共享战斗的盛宴。
让你饱饮蜜酒，
品尝我的力量！
要牢记此间的味道，
因为其中蕴含着胜利的甜蜜，
与失败的懊恼！”
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

要牢记此间的味道，
因为其中蕴含着胜利的甜蜜，
与失败的懊恼！”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}ウルファーはハルブラントを見下すような目つきで眺める。{/n}
「戦いの宴を俺と
共に過ごそう、若き同胞、
存分に味わい尽くすがいい
我が武勇のミョードを！
この味わいをよく覚えておけ、
勝利の甘さも敗北の苦味も
その中にあるのだから！」
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

traits.locale_text:

勝利の甘さも敗北の苦味も
その中にあるのだから！」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar mira a Halbrandt con condescendencia.{/n}
«El festín de la batalla compartiré
contigo, joven hermano,
¡para que así saborees con gusto
el mjod de mis hazañas!
Recuerda bien este gusto,
¡pues en él reside el dulzor del triunfo
y el amargor de la derrota!».
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

traits.locale_text:

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar lance un regard condescendant à Halbrandt.{/n}
« Je partagerai ce festin sanglant
avec toi, mon jeune frère,
afin que tu puisses savourer
le mjod de ma bravoure !
Souviens-toi bien de son goût,
car il recèle la douceur du triomphe
et l'amertume de la défaite ! »
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar wirft Halbrandt einen herablassenden Blick zu.{/n}
"Das Schlachtenmahl teile ich
mit Euch, junger Bruder,
damit Ihr gänzlich nutznießt
den Mjod meiner Stärke!
Merkt Euch den Geschmack,
er trägt die Süße des Triumphs
und auch die bittere Niederlage!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

languages.text:
{n}Ulfar, Halbrandt'a kibirli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
"Genç kardeşim, seninle
Savaş ziyafetini paylaşırım.
Böylece kana kana içersin
Yiğitlik mjodumu, haydi yiğidim.
Bu tadı asla unutmayasın
Zira zafer tatlılığı vardır
Ardında, bir de yenilginin acısı!"
languages.original_text:
{n}Ulfar gives Halbrandt a patronising look.{/n}
"The battle-feast I'll share
with you, young brother,
That you may fully savour
the mjod of my prowess!
Remember this taste well,
for in it lies triumph's sweetness
and the bitterness of loss!"

traits.locale_text:
{n}Ulfar, Halbrandt'a kibirli bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
"Savaş ziyafetini seninle
paylaşırım genç kardeşim.
Böylece yiğitliğimin mjod'unu
kana kana içebilirsin!
Bu tadı asla unutma
çünkü zaferin tatlılığı
ve yenilginin acısı vardır ardında!"
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
